nytimes.title: A Regal Beagle Seizes the Spotlight
nytimes.topComment: There are no doubts about it, these dogs are beautiful, and indeed there is much to be said about what each breed has as their characteristics. There is also much to report on the love of dogs, dedication, intrigue, and personalities of many involved...

nytimes.title: Doctors Strive to Do Less Harm by Inattentive Care
nytimes.topComment:
